sub_title: Country Manager | Covebo Hungary | Team Management, Strategic Growth, Leadership and Recruitment
summary:
In 2011 I started something very special named Hollandiai Magyarok (Hungarians in The Netherlands) Since then, Hollandiai Magyarok has grown into the leading online publisher and event organizer for the Hungarian community in the Netherlands with more than 45.000 members.

In 2021 I joined Covebo to lead the Hungarian recruitment. My role became way more fun than I ever expected. I can lead a great team, and do whatever I do best: creating and generating new ideas, where and how to grow further. A little bit of everything. Just enough, to always feel, I can do a little different, every single day.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 86332842, 'name': 'House of Covebo', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFsAg2XvCXbPQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1660650024497?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=C-ym-wrUsHcIs0BKtk_LAasaqDrBJylpCXYFKU1A9Tc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/house-of-covebo/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Nijkerk, Gelderland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'House of Covebo', 'description': "As the Country Manager focusing on Hungarian recruitment, I've played a significant role in expanding our organization's presence in Hungary.

Some of the highlights of my contributions include:

- Leading a diverse team of 13 members with a strategic approach, resulting in an impressive 400% growth in candidate placements within just one year.

- Tackling various challenges with strong problem-solving skills, leading to streamlined processes and increased efficiency within the team.

- Successfully establishing a new office in Miskolc, Hungary, through seamless coordination with legal, bookkeeping, and compliance teams. I also recruited key personnel, laying a strong foundation for the office's ongoing success.

- Ensuring effective communication within the team, ensuring everyone understands their tasks, deadlines, and company objectives clearly.

- Implementing a structured training program that significantly improved team performance and individual skills.

- Fostering a collaborative team environment that encouraged idea sharing, resulting in high-quality output and a positive work culture.

My achievements reflect my dedication to driving results while nurturing a supportive and productive team environment.", 'title': 'Country Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 53101595, 'name': 'Hollandiai Magyarok', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH2GswtFV3lvQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1589358925042?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=mzSX6b__zBKhp9mW9WZCk5zgn7jygJNjcNP8KI2yX-8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/hollandiaimagyarok/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Hollandiai Magyarok', 'description': "I take great pride in establishing and operating Hollandiai Magyarok, the top online platform for Hungarians living in the Netherlands. Our platform has achieved a monthly engagement of around 42,000 users, offering a wide range of resources, from timely news updates to job listings, housing services, events, and lifestyle advice, tailored to our community's unique needs.

As the driving force behind this initiative, my responsibilities span across various areas, including:

- Sales & Business Development: Implementing strategic plans and initiatives to fuel growth, boost user engagement, and solidify Hollandiai Magyarok as a reliable and valuable resource for Hungarians in the Netherlands.

- Event Planning & Management: Organizing and hosting diverse events that enrich the Hungarian community's experience in the Netherlands, fostering a strong sense of connection and camaraderie.

- Content Strategy: Ensuring that the content we provide remains relevant, accurate, and in tune with the interests and requirements of our users.

- Technical Oversight: Taking charge of the platform's technical aspects to ensure a seamless and user-friendly experience, regularly maintaining and troubleshooting the site.

Thanks to our collective efforts, Hollandiai Magyarok continues to flourish as a vital resource, strengthening the bonds and support network within the Hungarian community in the Netherlands. I'm grateful for the opportunity to play a pivotal role in this endeavor and make a positive impact on the lives of so many fellow Hungarians abroad.", 'title': 'Founder and Operator | Hollandiai Magyarok (Hungarians in The Netherlands)', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 12631315, 'name': 'CrossFit Miskolc', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF17di1w1WiaA/company-logo_400_400/0/1540491124229?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=VCJFgoh3nw5f79D08DMQ_z5HfR2mLSoLIzrQ_5IMpK8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/crossfitmiskolc/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Miskolc, Hungary', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'CrossFit Miskolc', 'description': "As the Founder and Head Coach at CrossFit Miskolc, my mission has been to cultivate a culture of health and wellness within our local community. By devising an engaging fitness program and leading a team of talented coaches, I've established a space where people of all fitness levels feel embraced, motivated, and supported.

Some of the key areas where I've made an impact include:

- Leadership and Development: As the Head Coach, I've taken on a leadership role, mentoring and guiding our team of coaches. I introduced a unique coach development program that elevates our coaching standards and skills, setting a benchmark for excellence within our community. Alongside this, I actively lead group classes and provide personalized instruction, ensuring our members receive the best coaching experience possible.

- Program Development: I've designed and continually refined a comprehensive daily CrossFit program, catering to diverse fitness levels and goals, so every individual can progress and achieve success.

- Safety Management: Upholding the highest safety standards, I ensure that all exercises are executed correctly and that our facility remains a safe and secure environment for all our members.

- Community Building: Throughout the year, I've taken the lead in organizing various community events, fostering a strong sense of camaraderie and connection among our members.

- Customer Service: I've been actively involved in managing membership inquiries, providing clear and detailed information about our programs and options, ensuring prospective and current members have a seamless experience.

- Facility Management: Collaborating with our fellow Head Coach, we continuously work on improving our facility, conducting team meetings, and implementing new initiatives to enhance our services.

- Private Coaching: Occasionally, I've conducted one-on-one coaching sessions, providing tailored fitness strategies to help individuals reach their specific goals.", 'title': 'Business Owner', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 301977, 'name': 'Mitsubishi Turbocharger and Engine Europe B.V.', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFUiwiHIQiN0Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1685951317450?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=T9beGcdB51EemHCoMKKt7T0B7FjjM_4y6QLrnyciKCI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mitsubishi-turbocharger-and-europe-bv/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Almere-Stad en omgeving, Nederland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Mitsubishi Turbocharger and Engine Europe', 'description': '- Approving / validating new and existing supplier manufacturing processes;

volunteer_experiences:
[{'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Founder', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'CipÅsdoboz AkciÃ³ Hollandia', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'CHILDREN', 'description': 'GOOD CAUSE
Make your own Shoe Box gift!
We are also launching the shoe box gift collection in the Netherlands for the fifth year in a row. This is a Christmas charity for orphans and children in need in Hungary, so that they can all have gifts under the Christmas tree.

In the first year, we collected 250 boxes, in 2019 1,300 boxes, 2020 850 boxes and last year 1250 boxes together with you, making us the largest foreign donator country for the second year in a row! Let it be no different this year!

Find an empty shoe box, choose how old young children you want to give a donation; little girl or boy, and fill the box full of lovely gifts. Pack your box and drop it off at one of our collection points.

https://hollandiaimagyarok.nl/ciposdoboz/ciposdoboz-akcio-in-english/'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Founder', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'ZsÃ¡kolj Ha Tudsz', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'POVERTY_ALLEVIATION', 'description': 'Hungarians in The Netherlands is an organization that was established in 2010 to help Hungarians living or moving to The Netherlands. Since then, our community has more than 42,000 people and grows by 150-200 people every month.
 
In addition to information and community building, we launched our first charity campaign in 2017. We joined the Shoe Box Campaign and managed to send more and more donations to Hungary every year. In the first year, the Hungarian community in the Netherlands collected more than 150 boxes, and our most recent largest donation already counted 1,400 boxes. We inform people about this promotion in a short video in 2 minutes: https://youtu.be/tWcRaJTlMgQ

Last year, in addition to the shoe box collecting, we also launched a spring charity program, which was given the fancy name "Bag it if You Can" - ZsÃ¡kolj Ha Tudsz. Here we collected used clothing for the homeless and people living in extreme poverty in Hungary. 2021 At the end of May, around 270 large bags of clothes left the Netherlands for Hungary. A short video also provides more information about this: https://youtu.be/vLcT2w_meq0

This year, immediately after the outbreak of the war in Ukraine, we decided to bring our Bag If You Know campaign forward and it will only last for 1 week instead of the usual 1 month collection. As part of the campaign, we had more than 35 collection points all over the Netherlands and after a week, together with hundreds of donors and covering a collection route of 7,900 km, we collected 2 truckloads of donations, which thanks to a Dutch logistics company, delivered in May to Hungary.

https://hollandiaimagyarok.nl/zsakolj-ha-tudsz-ukrajnaert-2022'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'role': 'Judge', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'CrossFit Games', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFW5Oi3HVjBVQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1673050669428?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=vC_SN9U2aI08UAVTtQJ2q4sjkWPevTwlulm94hpGHAs', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/crossfitgames/'}, 'cause': 'HEALTH', 'description': 'CrossFit Judge @ CrossFit Regionals Berlin'}]
